description: Explore the Port Groups to VLAN/Domain/Switch and Port Bindings

query.cypherQuery:
OPTIONAL MATCH (n:infraAccPortGrp) WHERE (n.fabric="$fabric") 
RETURN n.name as PGName
UNION
OPTIONAL MATCH (n:infraAccBndlGrp) WHERE (n.fabric="$fabric") 
RETURN n.name as PGName

title: Fabric Policies - Port Group
